TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1075
TEI.2.document_title: John K. Williams to Stephen F. Austin, 04-12-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: John K. Williams to John Sarver and John Dickenson, April 12, 1825. Agree-
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1075

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John K. Williams to John Sarver and John Dickenson, April 12, 1825. Agree-*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**person_mentioned*JAMES SARVER*/person_mentioned*'s LAND*/p*
*p*Know all men by this article that I *person_mentioned*John K. Williams*/person_mentioned* of the province of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* now residing in *location_mentioned*Austins Colony*/location_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*south fork of clear Creek*/location_mentioned* known by the name of *location_mentioned*Taylers Byou*/location_mentioned* have sold and Convayd unto *person_mentioned*John Sarver*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*John Dickinson*/person_mentioned* of the said *location_mentioned*province*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* a fore said my Labour and League of land for the consideration of one hundred dollars paid in Trade and Twelve good Seccond rate gentle Spanish horses well broke not over Eight nor under four years old, the said*person_mentioned* Williams*/person_mentioned* binds himself *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned*and so forth in the sum of two thousand dollars to make the said *person_mentioned*Sarver*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Dickinson*/person_mentioned* a good deed to hold the said land when paid for and also the said *person_mentioned*Sarver*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Dickinson*/person_mentioned* bind themselves in the sum of one thousand Dollars to pay the said *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* again the *date_mentioned n="05-25-1826">twenty fift day of May next*/date_mentioned* if posable and if not as soon [as] they posabley can the said *person_mentioned*William*/person_mentioned* binds himself to give said *person_mentioned*Sarver*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Dickinson*/person_mentioned* possession of the Sed Labour . . . improvements if required when paid for we the said *person_mentioned*Sarver and Dickinson*/person_mentioned* agrees to pay all the government fees given under our hands this *date_mentioned n="04-12-1825">Twelft day of April 1825*/date_mentioned* */p* */div1*
